Instance.description: A relationship bit specifically intended to represent social context.

Tunable.name: attention_cost
Tunable.description: Any Sim in this social context will add this amount to the attention cost of any social super interaction they are running.

TunableVariant.name: size_limit
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, this bit will only be available if the owner Sim is in a social context with the specified number of Sims. If there are more Sims than the specified limit, the bit will transform to another form, i.e. to a different bit.

Tunable.name: size
Tunable.description: The maximum number of Sims that can share a social context in order for this bit to be visible.

Tunable.name: transformation
Tunable.description: The bit that is going to replace this bit if the size limit is violated.
